archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0658
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable integration with inbound and outbound communications channels (internal and 3rd party) 1. Including: 2. Dialler (refer CC005) 3. SMS server 4. Email server 5. Letter distribution

properties.value: By "Letter distribution" you mean integration with printhouse? - Yes. What does mean CC005? - Automated calls to the customer that connect with an agent. File integration. VFNZ AP: Will you need additional (not listed in original requirement) notification (like push) in SC application?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
